i5.las2peer.security

Class ServiceAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.Agent
      • i5.las2peer.security.PassphraseAgent
        • i5.las2peer.security.ServiceAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlAble, MessageReceiver, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ServiceAgent
extends PassphraseAgent
    A service agent represents a service and its access rights in the LAS2peer setting.
